about_the_game:
The situation in Etheria has been unstable lately. The power cuts are becoming a constant occurrence, and the locals are forced to evacuate to other regions. These blackouts get fixed quickly, but rumors spread faster. Something bad is afoot, and you have to keep these rumors at bay. But they're not untrue. The World Tree, which feeds virtually everything in this world, right down to the portals through which you can no longer return home, has been struck by an unknown disease and is infecting the creatures around it, making them aggressive. The Tree has chosen several outlanders to protect the innocent etherians and find a cure. But do all of them have the Tree’s welfare at heart?

This Collector's Edition includes:

🌌 Intricate Puzzles and Mini-Games!
Enjoy solving over 100 challenging puzzles and brain teasers, each meticulously crafted to test your intellect and offer a gratifying experience. Enjoy relaxing mini-games that blend fun with strategic depth, providing a balanced gameplay experience!

🌌 Fantasy-Themed Artwork!
Explore a magic world brought to life by stunning fantasy-themed artwork. Each visual element enriches the game's atmosphere and deepens your connection to the enchanting world of Etheria!

🌌 Collectible Treasures!
Seek, find and collect a wide array of unique items throughout your journey. These collectibles not only add more challenges to your quest but also reveal additional insights into the rich lore and history of Etheria!

🌌 Impactful Choices!
Your decisions hold weight in the fate of Etheria. Every choice you make could influence the outcome of the story, and you must navigate complex relationships and motivations to determine who truly has the Tree’s welfare at heart!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space

short_description: As a growing darkness threatens to consume Etheria, you are among the chosen Guardians tasked with uncovering the truth and saving the Tree from a mysterious disease!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Russian
*languages with full audio support
